feed.title: Gravity Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Gravity: Release 0.21.1
entry.content:
Upgrade to this version of gravity by using this container image:

ghcr.io/beryju/gravity:v0.21.1

Upgrade to the current JS API Client using

npm i gravity-api@0.21.1

Upgrade to the current Golang API Client using

go get beryju.io/gravity@v0.21.1

Full Changelog: https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/compare/v0.21.0...v0.21.1

entry.title: New release for Gravity: Release 0.22.0
entry.content:
Upgrade to this version of gravity by using this container image:

ghcr.io/beryju/gravity:v0.22.0

Upgrade to the current JS API Client using

npm i gravity-api@0.22.0

Upgrade to the current Golang API Client using

go get beryju.io/gravity@v0.22.0

What's Changed

  • build(deps): bump rollup from 4.30.0 to 4.30.1 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1425
  • build(deps): bump google.golang.org/protobuf from 1.36.1 to 1.36.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1424
  • build(deps): bump docker/build-push-action from 6.10.0 to 6.11.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1428
  • build(deps): bump library/node from 23.5 to 23.6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1427
  • dns: add missing filters for type and UID by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1429
  • web: general quality of life improvements by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1426

Full Changelog: https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/compare/v0.21.1...v0.22.0

entry.title: New release for Gravity: Release 0.23.0
entry.content:
Upgrade to this version of gravity by using this container image:

ghcr.io/beryju/gravity:v0.23.0

Upgrade to the current JS API Client using

npm i gravity-api@0.23.0

Upgrade to the current Golang API Client using

go get beryju.io/gravity@v0.23.0

What's Changed

  • convert: add initial bind zone importer by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1431
  • dhcp: test low-level handler by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1423
  • dns: per-zone metrics by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1432

Full Changelog: https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/compare/v0.22.0...v0.23.0

entry.title: New release for Gravity: Release 0.24.0
entry.content:
Upgrade to this version of gravity by using this container image:

ghcr.io/beryju/gravity:v0.24.0

Upgrade to the current JS API Client using

npm i gravity-api@0.24.0

Upgrade to the current Golang API Client using

go get beryju.io/gravity@v0.24.0

What's Changed

  • build(deps): bump eslint from 9.17.0 to 9.18.0 in /web in the eslint group by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1435
  • dhcp: add web import support, start wizard by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1434
  • converter: add opnsense dnsmasq importer by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1433

Full Changelog: https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/compare/v0.23.1...v0.24.0
